name: bitween-software/dev-to-open-api-client
description: Access Forem articles, users and other resources via API.  For a real-world example of Forem in action, check out [DEV](https://www.dev.to).  All endpoints that don't require authentication are CORS enabled.  Dates and date times, unless otherwise specified, must be in the [RFC 3339](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339) format.  # Authentication  <!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->
